frontmatter.title: 문제 해결 프로그래밍 / Problem Solving and Programming
frontmatter.description: This course aims to cultivate practical skills to solve programming challenges based on what students learned from the data structure and additional techniques, including string manipulation, sorting, backtracking, graph traversal, and dynamic programming.
